column8: 技能描述
Normal Monster
Mana 30: Next attack deal 200% attack damage.
Item card equiped to this monster will be cast again.
Its attack power is doubled for each 2-star or higher monster used as a tribute.
When summoned. Repeat all Summon effects triggered so far this battle.
Upon Summon: Create a copy of itself
Upon Summon: deal 10 damage to all enemy monster
Upon Summon: Draw 3 card
Upon Summon: Gain 2 enegy
Upon Summon: Increase the attack power of the monster to its right by 10.
Upon Summon: Increase the health point of the monster to its right of by 80
Mana 60: Deal 300% attack damage to all enemy monster
It's attack power and health will increase by the tribute's stats.
技能描述
Deal 10 damage
Increase 40 health
Draw 2 card
Apply 10 attack power
Choose an enemy monster. You can move its position.
Select one Spell or Weapon card. Create a copy
Double attrack power
Choose a friendly unit, Add a copy to your hand.
Increase rank by 1 and apply 5 attack power.
Select one of your monsters on the field, create a 1 attack power, 1 health point copy, and add it to your hand.
Summon a slime with 1 attack power and 1 health point.
